title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the partisan control of government in the scenario.

For Task A2, the response must explain how that party control could have affected the process by which the bill became a law.

For Task B, the response must explain why a Republican in the House of Representatives might have cast a vote against this bill.

For Task C1, the response must describe a part of the judicial branch that could affect this law.

For Task C2, the response must explain how that part of the judicial branch might affect the success of this law.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any five of the tasks set by the question.
